title: [突發] HKU 個研究生會改咗7月14號！！

replies.msg:
聽講係今朝出電郵改做7月14號，唔該幫手推一推，等大家唔好去錯日子！！

電郵全文如下：
From: pgsa@hku.hk
cc: mail.service@intranet.hku.hk
Date: July 7, 2019, 7:06 AM


[PGSA] Reschedule of the Annual General Meeting

Dear all postgraduate students,

We have received a few concerns from our Members related to the insufficient notification period of the Annual General Meeting. According to the Constitution,
"The Annual General Meeting (AGM) shall be held within two weeks after the Annual Election of the Executive Committee." (Section IV, Article 2)
"Members shall be notified of the meeting at least seven clear days in advance." (Section VIII, Article 1)
we decide to reschedule the Annual General Meeting. We kindly invite you to attend the meeting to raise your valuable comments and witness the inauguration of the new Session of Executive Committee.

Details of the Annual General Meeting:
Date: 14 July 2019 (Sunday)
Time: 2:00 PM
Venue: Wang Gungwu Theatre, Graduate House

Attachments:
Agenda of the meeting: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Ea2fT1KVyyPnRB0XJx5cSI1F2z6HpUbd
The current Constitution: https://www.pgsa.hku.hk/structure/constitution
The drafted amendment of the Constitution: https://www.pgsa.hku.hk/doc/download/Draft_Constitution_2019.pdf

If you have any queries, please contact us via pgsa@hku.hk, PGSA appreciates all your interest and participation. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.

Best regards,

Postgraduate Student Association
THE UNIVERSITY OF HONG KONG
P407, Graduate House, No.3 University Drive
pgsa@hku.hk | www.pgsa.hku.hk

replies.msg: 致張翔公開信聯署

朋友問起我佢有冇得投，我認真睇下研究生會cons，發覺佢直情今年已經唔提得修憲喇喎

佢77個會唔夠7 clear days所以開唔到，宜家佢今年AGM已經註定修唔可以提出修憲。

今年研究生會6月26號完成Annual Election，按研究生會憲章IV. Article 2A，AE後兩星期內要開AGM，即7月10號前要開到AGM。

而按憲章VIII Article 1，如果AGM要修憲，須於AGM 7 clear days前通知會員 (亦因此Undergrad文中指77不能開會，因為佢7月1號 7am通知7月7號 2pm開會，得6.5 clear days)。 今日開唔到會，響7月10號前已經不可能有7個完整日俾佢再提開修憲AGM。

佢今日再唔約會，直情連唔修憲普通AGM要求3 clear days前通知都做唔到添喎。

:0)

----------------------------------
IV. GENERAL MEETINGS AND GENERAL POLLINGS

Article 2 – GENERAL MEETINGS

a) General Meetings shall be held only with the approval of, or at the request of, either the
Council or the Executive Committee, or in accordance with a requisition signed by no less
than five percent of the Full Members of the Association. The Annual General Meeting
(AGM) shall be held within two weeks after the好 Annual Election of the Executive Committee;

----------------------------------

VIII. CONSTITUTION
Article 1 – AMENDMENT
The Constitution shall not be amended except by a motion carried by at least 2/3 Executive
Committee members and 3/5 Council members at the Annual General Meeting of the Association.
Members shall be notified of the meeting at least seven clear days in advance.

----------------------------------

https://www.pgsa.hku.hk/structure/constitution
推

replies.msg:
背景資料：
1. Annual election喺26/6完成左。
2. 1/7出notice話7/7開AGM+改constitution。
3. 依家又改左做14/7開AGM。

簡單黎講：
1. 開Annual general meeting (AGM)要有3整日 (three clear days) 通知期。
2. AGM要喺annual election之後2星期內(27/6-9/7)開會。
3. 想改constitution要7整日(seven clear days) 通知期。
4. 佢本身1/7 call 7/7開AGM，就咁開AGM係ok，但唔夠通知期改constitution。
5. 另外想改cons要有7日通知期，但如果1/7 call會，7/7開會，當中只有5日通知期，所以又係違憲。
6. 依家改14/7開AGM，又係違憲，因為唔係喺annual election後嘅2星期開AGM。
7. FYI，cons只可以喺AGM改，如果今次唔改就要等下年。

To conclude，佢依家改14/7開AGM，咪又係違憲，做乜事姐？



利申：HKU part-time postgrad，undergrad都係HKU

Fact check https://www.undergrad.hk/17566?fbclid=IwAR2gchmSzrXqfnGWNb8syOg5_CIPsJ6VnUL-Ur1zgu0VP7wQQ2YKzf5brtM

睇完，好亂

篇野既意思係咪:
7月7開會，通知期唔夠7整日，違憲;
7月14開會，超過週年會員大選2星期，違憲

咁佢地仲攪乜

背景資料：
1. Annual election喺26/6完成左。
2. 1/7出notice話7/7開AGM+改constitution。
3. 依家又改左做14/7開AGM。

簡單黎講：
1. 開Annual general meeting (AGM)要有3整日 (three clear days) 通知期。
2. AGM要喺annual election之後2星期內(27/6-9/7)開會。
3. 想改constitution要7整日(seven clear days) 通知期。
4. 佢本身1/7 call 7/7開AGM，就咁開AGM係ok，但唔夠通知期改constitution。
5. 另外想改cons要有7日通知期，但如果1/7 call會，7/7開會，當中只有5日通知期，所以又係違憲。
6. 依家改14/7開AGM，又係違憲，因為唔係喺annual election後嘅2星期開AGM。
7. FYI，cons只可以喺AGM改，如果今次唔改就要等下年。

To conclude，佢依家改14/7開AGM，咪又係違憲，做乜事姐？



利申：HKU part-time postgrad，undergrad都係HKU

quote.msg:
朋友問起我佢有冇得投，我認真睇下研究生會cons，發覺佢直情今年已經唔提得修憲喇喎

佢77個會唔夠7 clear days所以開唔到，宜家佢今年AGM已經註定修唔可以提出修憲。

今年研究生會6月26號完成Annual Election，按研究生會憲章IV. Article 2A，AE後兩星期內要開AGM，即7月10號前要開到AGM。

而按憲章VIII Article 1，如果AGM要修憲，須於AGM 7 clear days前通知會員 (亦因此Undergrad文中指77不能開會，因為佢7月1號 7am通知7月7號 2pm開會，得6.5 clear days)。 今日開唔到會，響7月10號前已經不可能有7個完整日俾佢再提開修憲AGM。

佢今日再唔約會，直情連唔修憲普通AGM要求3 clear days前通知都做唔到添喎。

:0)

----------------------------------
IV. GENERAL MEETINGS AND GENERAL POLLINGS

Article 2 – GENERAL MEETINGS

a) General Meetings shall be held only with the approval of, or at the request of, either the
Council or the Executive Committee, or in accordance with a requisition signed by no less
than five percent of the Full Members of the Association. The Annual General Meeting
(AGM) shall be held within two weeks after the好 Annual Election of the Executive Committee;

----------------------------------

VIII. CONSTITUTION
Article 1 – AMENDMENT
The Constitution shall not be amended except by a motion carried by at least 2/3 Executive
Committee members and 3/5 Council members at the Annual General Meeting of the Association.
Members shall be notified of the meeting at least seven clear days in advance.

----------------------------------

https://www.pgsa.hku.hk/structure/constitution

replies.msg: Pish

[長文]
係咁兒睇下個想改嘅cons，見到太多魔鬼細節：

原本：
The missions of the Association shall be:
a) To promote postgraduate students’ welfare,
b) To serve all postgraduate students of the University,
c) To promote the communication between postgraduate students and the University,
d) To represent the postgraduate student body both locally and internationally.

新：
Article 2 – MISSIONS
The missions of the Association shall be:
a) to promote the welfare of the postgraduate students;
b) to serve and represent the postgraduate students both locally and internationally;
c) to act as a bridge between the postgraduate students and the University authority in furthering the interests of the postgraduate students as a whole; and
d) to represent the postgraduate student community in external affairs in furthering the interest of the postgraduate students.

喂！由student body變做students！真係覺得我地唔識字呀！PGSA不代表我呀！

新加，之前無：
Article 6—LEGALITY
The Association is registered as a society at Hong Kong Police Force.
The Association and all the activities shall not violate the Basic Law of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region (HKSAR) of the People’s Republic of China, other laws of HKSAR, public order and good customs.
你班支那蝗番大陸啦，做乜要d活動要符合基本法！！

原本：
Article 2 – GENERAL MEETINGS
a) General Meetings shall be held only with the approval of, or at the request of, either the Council or the Executive Committee, or in accordance with a requisition signed by no less than five percent of the Full Members of the Association. The Annual General Meeting
(AGM) shall be held within two weeks after the Annual Election of the Executive Committee;
b) The President of the Association shall be the ex-officio Convener of General Meetings. In the absence of the President, the Chairman of the Council shall be the Convener of General Meetings;
c) Minutes of General Meetings shall be taken by officers in the Secretariat of the Executive Committee;
d) All members of the Association, Executive Committee members, and Council members have full speaking right and voting right toward affairs discussed in the General Meetings;
e) A notice of General Meeting and the motion or motions to be voted on shall be posted three clear days beforehand.
Article 4 – PUBLICITY
The minutes of all General Meetings and the results of all General Polling shall be publicized to all members of the Association.

新：
Article 2 – GENERAL MEETING
No General Meeting shall be held unless it is convened by the Council Chairperson
a) at the request of the Council;
b) at the request of the Executive Committee; or
c) in accordance with a requisition signed by no less than five percent (5%) of Full Members of the Association.
Any such requisition of General Meeting shall specify the object of the proposed meeting and no other affair shall be discussed thereat without the consent of at least two-thirds (2/3) of the members present.
Article 3 – ANNUAL GENERAL MEETING
The Annual General Meeting (AGM), defined as a kind of General Meeting, shall be held within two (2) weeks after the Annual Election.
The result of the Annual Election shall be announced, and the inauguration shall be held on the AGM.
Article 5 – NOTICE
Notice of all General Meetings and the agenda thereof shall be posted five (5) clear days beforehand.

紅字嗰d無左，姐係 1) members去到，無constitution protect members有full speaking rights啦！2) 同埋所有minutes同results都唔洗話比members知啦！！


(待續)

(繼續)

原本：
CONSTITUTION
Article 1 – AMENDMENT
The Constitution shall not be amended except by a motion carried by at least 2/3 Executive Committee members and 3/5 Council members at the Annual General Meeting of the Association.
Members shall be notified of the meeting at least seven clear days in advance.

新：
Chapter VI CONSTITUTION
Article 1 – CONSTITUTION AMENDMENT
The Constitution shall not be amended except by a motion carried by no less than two-thirds (2/3) of the Executive Committee or two-thirds (2/3) of the Council at a General Meeting or by General Polling. All members shall be notified at least five (5) clear days before the GeneralMeeting or the General Polling.
Article 2 – REGULATIONS
The Executive Committee shall be eligible to legislate and revise regulations for specific operations according to this Constitution. The regulation is valid after filed by the Council. A regulation will be invalid if it conflicts with this Constitution.

仲想隨時開meeting話改就改cons，縮短埋個通知期！！

原本：
Article 3 – GENERAL POLLINGS
a) General Polling shall only be conducted by the Council with the approval of, or at the request of, either the Council or the Executive Committee, or in accordance with a requisition signed by no less than five percent of the Full Members of the Association.
b) Voting shall take place at polling stations which shall open for no less than eight hours.
c) A notice of all General Polling and the motion or motions to be voted on shall be posted three clear days beforehand.

新：
Article 4 – POLLING
a) Polling shall take place at both physical polling stations and/or online polling website which both shall open for no less than eight hours; and
b) The result of the General Polling shall be declared valid provided the number of votes cast is no less than ten percent of all the Associate Members and Full Members of the Association. The motion(s) shall be declared if the number of votes cast for the motion(s) exceeds the number of votes cast against the said motion(s) and the aggregate number of the votes for and against the said motion(s) exceeds the number of abstain votes.

and/or online polling都得，有無搞錯！！

應該仲有好多奇怪改動，我未得閒睇曬
我冇野講
hku post grad一定要出席反映民意！

quote.msg:
聽講係今朝出電郵改做7月14號，唔該幫手推一推，等大家唔好去錯日子！！

電郵全文如下：
From: pgsa@hku.hk
cc: mail.service@intranet.hku.hk
Date: July 7, 2019, 7:06 AM


[PGSA] Reschedule of the Annual General Meeting

Dear all postgraduate students,

We have received a few concerns from our Members related to the insufficient notification period of the Annual General Meeting. According to the Constitution,
"The Annual General Meeting (AGM) shall be held within two weeks after the Annual Election of the Executive Committee." (Section IV, Article 2)
"Members shall be notified of the meeting at least seven clear days in advance." (Section VIII, Article 1)
we decide to reschedule the Annual General Meeting. We kindly invite you to attend the meeting to raise your valuable comments and witness the inauguration of the new Session of Executive Committee.

Details of the Annual General Meeting:
Date: 14 July 2019 (Sunday)
Time: 2:00 PM
Venue: Wang Gungwu Theatre, Graduate House

Attachments:
Agenda of the meeting: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Ea2fT1KVyyPnRB0XJx5cSI1F2z6HpUbd
The current Constitution: https://www.pgsa.hku.hk/structure/constitution
The drafted amendment of the Constitution: https://www.pgsa.hku.hk/doc/download/Draft_Constitution_2019.pdf

If you have any queries, please contact us via pgsa@hku.hk, PGSA appreciates all your interest and participation. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.

Best regards,

Postgraduate Student Association
THE UNIVERSITY OF HONG KONG
P407, Graduate House, No.3 University Drive
pgsa@hku.hk | www.pgsa.hku.hk
